description:
***SPECIAL LAUNCH DISCOUNT. TAKE THIS COURSE NOW FOR ONLY $9*** 

NOTE: THIS IS THE LOWEST PRICE I CAN SELL THIS COURSE FOR ON UDEMY UNTIL APRIL. SO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF IT NOW!       ADDITIONAL COUPONS WILL NOT WORK. 


These 20+ Training Videos will walk you through the exact step-by-step system you will use to start earning a six-figure income on Kindle today.

This includes…

The “Buried Treasure” Secret that lets you effortlessly spot red hot Kindle publishing niches where you can easily rank your books.

The 5-Star Secret to “modelling” proven bestsellers in your niche, so you can publish irresistible, well reviewed books every time.

The Secret Of The 48 Hour Bestseller you will use to publish your book - rocket up the Amazon rankings in your niche - and start earning within TWO days.

Plus other training like…

How to come up with a “must read” title for your book that will practically force people to buy and open your books - even if they’ve never heard of you.

The secret to outsourcing your books to native U.S. english writers for under $80 per book - giving you a library of 5-star bestsellers for pennies on the dollar.

One technique I use to get very high quality reviews - from the most trusted reviewers on Amazon - so your book rockets to the top of the search results.

I even give you a trick for building an email list in your niche BEFORE you publish your book. You can use your list to promote DOZENS of books.

Here is what you will discover in the course...

  • 6 Secrets to Becoming a Best Selling Author
  • How to Come Up with Effective Title and an Outline
  • How to Create Professional Covers for as little as $1
  • How to Create a Highly Targeted Buyers List for Free
  • Secrets to Getting Tons of Positive Reviews
  • How to Publish a Paperback - Increase Your Sales by 30% or More
  • How to Turn Your Book into an Audiobook and Earn Even More Money
  • How to do a Book Promotion Outside of Amazon and Get Tons of Sales

Plus lots… lots… lots… more.
title: Become A Best Selling Author On Kindle
